name: LEEK FARMER: 2156
description:
Gameplay video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eHVGtdBZ9M8

Download our game now!

Set in the future, this game tells the story of a world which has been polluted by big factories. Every day and every night the world is covered in acidic rain, making it impossible to cultivate the earth as we normally would. Your task is to manage an indoor leek farm to provide food for the hungry population. Acid slowly corrodes the roof and it's your job to keep the acid rain from leaking through the roof and down onto the leeks.
